model.name: views
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Books_tableView ( ISBN string, TITLE string, PUBLISHER bigdecimal, PUBLISH_YEAR bigdecimal, EDITION bigdecimal, TYPE string, PRIMARY KEY(ISBN) ) AS SELECT ISBN, TITLE, PUBLISHER, PUBLISH_YEAR, EDITION, TYPE FROM BOOKS;

model.name: Oracle11_Books
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE BOOKS ( ISBN string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"ISBN"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR2'), TITLE string(255) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"TITLE"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR2'), SUBTITLE string(255) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"SUBTITLE"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR2'), PUBLISHER bigdecimal(10) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"PUBLISHER"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'NUMBER', "CHAR_OCTET_LENGTH" '22'), PUBLISH_YEAR bigdecimal(10) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"PUBLISH_YEAR"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'NUMBER', "CHAR_OCTET_LENGTH" '22'), EDITION bigdecimal(10) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"EDITION"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'NUMBER', "CHAR_OCTET_LENGTH" '22'), TYPE string(255) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"TYPE"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR2') ) OPTIONS ("UPDATABLE" 'TRUE', "NAMEINSOURCE" '"BOOKS"', "CARDINALITY" '41');
